snippet.title: Batman: Arkham Knight – Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #1
snippet.description:
Batman: Arkham Knight – Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #1

Batman: Arkham Knight – Season Pass DLC Videos Playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7N-XnsRG9lw96wNsxCJ7IWDaGr477D2p

***************************************************

Assault on GCPD (0:03) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 30,000 points.
● 02 - Score 20,000 points.
● 01 - Score 10,000 points.

Total Score: 129,370

Characters Skins: Batman; One Year Later Robin

-

Newton's Cradle (2:51) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 34,000 points.
● 02 - Score 18,000 points.
● 01 - Score 8,000 points.

Total Score: 250,480

Character Skin: Original Arkham Nightwing

-

Cat's Conundrum (6:05) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 15,000 points.
● 02 - Score 10,000 points.
● 01 - Score 5,000 points.

Total Score: 76,745

Character Skin: 1990s Catwoman

-

Teen Titan (8:39) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 50,000 points.
● 02 - Score 30,000 points.
● 01 - Score 15,000 points.

Total Score: 203,335

Character Skin: New 52 Robin

-

Financial Crash (12:30) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● Avoid taking any damage.
● Take out at least 3 enemies with a single chandelier (RHD required).
● Avoid using any fear takedowns.

Time Taken: 1:17.92

Character Skin: Justice League 3000 Batman

-

Deconstruction (14:28) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● Prevent enemies from deploying sentry guns.
● Take out an enemy from below using a ceiling grate takedown (upgrade required).
● Disarm 3 enemies using industrial electromagnets (REC required).

Time Taken: 1:20.20

Character Skin: 1st Appearance Batman

***************************************************

Game available on: PlayStation 4, Xbox One & PC
Video recorded on: Playstation 4

PSN: TheArkhamChannel

***************************************************

This is a channel mainly focused on providing the Arkham fans with all the latest news, official trailers, and gameplay videos about the Arkham games. The channel is not affiliated with Rocksteady Studios or WB Games.

Subscribe here:
http://goo.gl/vx4waB
